package ecxeption;

public class test {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
try
{
	int a=10,b=0,c;
	c=a/b;
	System.out.println("value of c" +c);
}
 catch(Exception e)
{
	 System.out.println(e.getMessage());
}
System.out.println("nivedita");
	}

}
